title: This shouldn't even need to be reported, Gangplank's recall animation.
body: So, fat Gangplank is the new base skin? Well, his recall animation shows him pantomiming sitting on a chest... Seriously? No one's going to fix that?

replies.body:
Hiya Treasure Goblin,

We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
YARR HARR FIDDLE DEEDEE BEING A PIRATE IS FRIGGIN OP CRITING ALL DAY AND AVOIDING CC YOU ARE A PIRATE
if this were GD i'd thank you for the bump
